description: Full stack web developer and student in Bachelor of Systems.
brIAn: BrIAn is an AI-powered chatbot for Discord designed to interact in voice channels, providing intelligent real-time responses and the ability to play music.
set_paddel_house: Set Paddel House WEB is a web platform designed to offer an interactive and functional experience for managing paddle activities.
chat: Real-time chat between multiple users using Node.js and Socket.io.
calculadora_impuestos_steam: Web application to calculate Steam taxes in Argentina.
redes: Practical work for the Operating Systems and Networks course, where we configured and simulated networks in Cisco Packet Tracer.
ecommerce: Project where I developed an e-commerce using React.
